model

Class Booking

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Booking

  • public class Booking
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Booking which captures the moviegoer details and transactionID.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Royston

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int cinemaID
      Cinema ID of the booking.
      private java.lang.String emailAddress
      Email address of the moviegoer.
      private java.lang.String mobileNum
      Mobile number of the moviegoer.
      private int movieScreeningID
      Movie screening ID of the booking.
      private java.lang.String transactionId
      Unique Transaction ID for each Booking.
      private java.lang.String userName
      Name of the moviegoer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Booking

        public Booking(int movieScreeningID,
               java.lang.String userName,
               java.lang.String mobileNum,
               java.lang.String emailAddress,
               int cinemaID)
        Creates a new Booking with its details. It will create the respective transaction ID.
        Parameters:
        movieScreeningID - The Movie screening ID of the booking.
        userName - Name of the moviegoer.
        mobileNum - Mobile number of the moviegoer.
        emailAddress - Email address of the moviegoer.
        cinemaID - CinemaID of the booking.

      • Booking

        public Booking(int movieScreeningID,
               java.lang.String userName,
               java.lang.String mobileNum,
               java.lang.String emailAddress,
               java.lang.String transactionId,
               int cinemaID)
        Creates a new booking with its details. This constructor is called by the loading of database.
        Parameters:
        movieScreeningID - The Movie screening ID of the booking.
        userName - Name of the moviegoer.
        mobileNum - Mobile number of the moviegoer.
        emailAddress - Email address of the moviegoer.
        transactionId - TransactionID of the booking.
        cinemaID - CinemaID of the booking.
